content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
The Comment object
The Comment object represents the content of comment nodes in a document.
Comment Object Properties
Property
Description
data
Sets or returns the text of this node
length
Returns the length of the text of this node
Comment Object Methods
Property
Description
appendData()
Appends data to the node
deleteData()
Deletes data from the node
insertData()
Inserts data into the node
replaceData()
Replaces data in the node
substringData()
Extracts data from the node
